summary: A military group of men is locked up in a bunker in an unknown future. All those soldiers are waiting for an eventual enemy. But the discovery of a certain project will cause several ... See full summary »
cast: Jean Marie De Busscher|Marc Caro|Patrice Succi|Gilles Adrien|Spot|Vincent Ferniot|Thierry Fournier|Zorin|Eric Caro|Jean-Pierre Jeunet|Bruno Richard|Hervé Di Rosa
title: Le bunker de la dernière rafale
